com.emc.object.s3.jersey

Class GeoPinningFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.jersey.api.client.filter.ClientFilter
      • com.emc.object.s3.jersey.GeoPinningFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientHandler

    public class GeoPinningFilter
extends com.sun.jersey.api.client.filter.ClientFilter
    Note: this filter must be applied *before* the BucketFilter (it does not remove the bucket from the path to extract the object key)
